articles.title: Citizen scientists observe gamma-ray glows that may reveal origin of lightning - Phys.org
articles.description: A research group led by Kyoto University, in cooperation with a network of citizen supporters, has collected data from gamma-ray glows—a phenomenon where high-energy photons crash to the ground from rolling thunderclouds—that may illuminate lightning's origin…
